scanner.help_message:
I18n Text Scanner

Usage: node i18ntk-scanner.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --output <file>        Output file for scan results (default: ./i18ntk-scanner-report.json)
  --framework <name>     Framework to target (react, vue, angular, vanilla)
  --patterns <patterns>  Custom regex patterns (comma-separated)
  --include-tests        Include test files in scan
  --exclude-dirs <dirs>  Directories to exclude (comma-separated)
  --help                Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --source-dir=./src --framework=react
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --patterns 'console.log\((.*?)\)' --include-tests
  node i18ntk-scanner.js --output=./scan-results.json

help_options.source_dir: Source directory to scan for i18n issues
help_options.output_dir: Directory for scan reports and results
help_options.patterns: Custom regex patterns for text detection
help_options.exclude: File patterns to exclude from scanning
help_options.min_length: Minimum text length to consider for translation
help_options.max_length: Maximum text length to consider for translation
help_options.include_tests: Include test files in the scanning process

scanner.starting: ğŸ” Starting text scanner for framework: {framework}
scanner.noTextsFound: âœ… No hardcoded English texts found

welcome.title: ğŸ¯ Welcome to the Text Scanner!
welcome.description: This tool scans your source code for hardcoded English text that may need translation.

fixer.help_message:
I18n Translation Fixer

Usage: node i18ntk-fixer.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./locales)
  --languages <langs>    Comma separated list of languages to fix
  --markers <markers>    Comma separated markers to treat as untranslated
  --no-backup           Skip automatic backup creation
  --help                Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --languages de,fr
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --source-dir=./locales --markers NOT_TRANSLATED
  node i18ntk-fixer.js --no-backup
fixer.starting: ğŸš€ Starting translation fixing for languages: {languages}
fixer.noLanguages: âŒ No languages specified for fixing.
fixer.allComplete: ğŸ‰ All translations are already complete!
fixer.reviewReport: Please review the report before proceeding.
fixer.noIssues: âœ… No issues found. All translations are complete.
fixer.moreIssues: ... and {count} more issues. Check the report file for complete details.
fixer.confirmationTitle: ğŸ¤” Do you want to proceed with these fixes?
fixer.nonInteractiveMode: âš¡ Non-interactive mode detected - applying fixes automatically...

summary.foundMissingKeys: ğŸ“‹ Found {count} missing keys from usage analysis
summary.couldNotParse: âŒ Could not parse usage report. Using common keys...

validate.help_message:
I18n Translation Validator

Usage: node i18ntk-validate.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-report        Generate detailed report
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for reports (default: ./reports)
  --help                 Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-validate.js --output-report
  node i18ntk-validate.js --source-dir=./app --i18n-dir=./locales
  node i18ntk-validate.js --output-dir=./analysis --output-report
validate.title: ğŸ” I18n Translation Validator
validate.noTargetLanguages: No target languages configured; skipping target validation. Add languages via "i18ntk init --languages=de,fr".
validate.resolveMissingFilesAndSyntaxErrors: 1. Resolve missing files and syntax errors
validate.reviewWarnings: Review warnings and fix where appropriate
validate.considerRunningWithStrict: 2. Consider running with --strict flag for stricter validation
validate.considerRunningUsageAnalysis: Consider running usage analysis: node i18ntk-usage.js
validate.validationPassed: âœ… Validation passed with no errors
validate.noJsonFilesFound: No JSON files found in source directory: {sourceDir}
validate.failedToCreateSampleTranslationFile: Failed to create sample translation file

autorun.help_message:
I18n Autorun Tool

Usage: node i18ntk-autorun.js [options]

Options:
  --config <file>        Configuration file (default: ./i18ntk.config.js)
  --dry-run             Show what would be done without executing
  --verbose             Show detailed output
  --help                Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-autorun.js
  node i18ntk-autorun.js --dry-run
  node i18ntk-autorun.js --config=./my-config.js --verbose
autorun.dryRunMode: ğŸ§ª DRY RUN MODE - No changes will be made
autorun.noConfigFound: âŒ No configuration file found. Create i18ntk.config.js

analyze.help_message:
I18n Analysis Tool

Usage: node i18ntk-analyze.js [options]

Options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to analyze (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-report        Generate detailed analysis report
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for reports (default: ./reports)
  --format <format>      Output format (json, csv, html)
  --help                 Show this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-analyze.js
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --output-report
  node i18ntk-analyze.js --source-dir=./app --format=html
analyze.noData: âš ï¸  No translation data found to analyze
